item.title: Z3 Mono Starter
item.description: Have you ever thought how exciting verification tools are? How do you prove the correctness of a program? Of course, the green tests bring some confidence… but we all know it’s not a proof. Just look at Pex, it definitely can’t leave anybody cold (recommendation: skip this step for now, it was a trap). But this story is not about Pex, but what powers it - Z3, an efficient SMT solver from Microsoft Research.
